title: The Company that Poisoned 300,000 Babies
itunes:title: The Company that Poisoned 300,000 Babies
description:
Christopher Wong is joined by Robert Evans to discuss the 2008 Tainted Milk Scandal.

FOOTNOTES:

https://www.nytimes.com/2008/10/04/world/asia/04milk.html?pagewanted=all&_r=0%20NYT

The Contaminated Milk Affair - Frédéric Keck
